_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The claims of the brahmins [mn84:11.5]: Only brahmins are the highest caste; other castes are inferior.
Only brahmins are the light caste; other castes are dark.
Only brahmins are purified, not others.
Only brahmins are Brahmā’s rightful sons, born of his mouth, born of Brahmā, created by Brahmā, heirs of Brahmā.
The actions and consequences of individu: Kills living creatures, steals, and commits sexual misconduct
Uses speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
Covetous, malicious, and has wrong view
Refrains from killing living creatures, stealing, and lying
Abstains from eating at night, eats in one part of the day, and is celibate, ethical, and of good character
The treatment of individuals based on th: Aristocrat who has lost their former status
Brahmin, merchant, or worker who has lost their former status
